verses.text: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tune \w of|strong="H1121"\w* “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.” \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Maskil \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* love \w song|strong="H7892"\w*. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1121"\w* stirred \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* noble theme \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* recite \w my|strong="H5921"\w* verses \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w skillful|strong="H4905"\w* writer.

\w You|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w handsome|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w*; grace \w has|strong="H4428"\w* anointed \w your|strong="H1697"\w* lips; therefore God \w has|strong="H4428"\w* blessed \w you|strong="H3820"\w* forever.

Strap \w your|strong="H5921"\w* sword \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H8193"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* warrior; appear \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* majesty \w and|strong="H1121"\w* splendor.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w splendor|strong="H1926"\w* ride forth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* victory \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* truth \w and|strong="H2719"\w* humility \w and|strong="H2719"\w* justice; \w may|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* right hand show \w your|strong="H5921"\w* awesome deeds.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* arrows pierce \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hearts \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*’s foes; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations fall beneath \w your|strong="H5921"\w* feet.

\w Your|strong="H5307"\w* throne, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, endures forever \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ever, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* justice \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* scepter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Your|strong="H5307"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5769"\w* have loved righteousness \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hated wickedness; therefore God, \w your|strong="H5769"\w* God, has anointed \w you|strong="H5769"\w* above \w your|strong="H5769"\w* companions \w with|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H7626"\w* oil \w of|strong="H7626"\w* joy.

\w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* garments \w are|strong="H2270"\w* fragrant \w with|strong="H5921"\w* myrrh \w and|strong="H8081"\w* aloes \w and|strong="H8081"\w* cassia; \w from|strong="H5921"\w* palaces \w of|strong="H5921"\w* ivory \w the|strong="H5921"\w* harps make \w you|strong="H5921"\w* glad.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H4480"\w* kings \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* honored women; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* queen stands \w at|strong="H1964"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand, adorned \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gold \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Ophir.

Listen, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*! Consider \w and|strong="H4428"\w* incline \w your|strong="H4428"\w* ear: Forget \w your|strong="H4428"\w* people \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* father’s house,

\w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king \w will|strong="H5971"\w* desire \w your|strong="H5186"\w* beauty; \w bow|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* lord.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Daughter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Tyre \w will|strong="H4428"\w* come \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gift; men \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wealth \w will|strong="H4428"\w* seek \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w favor|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w All|strong="H6440"\w* glorious \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* princess \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H1323"\w* chamber; \w her|strong="H1323"\w* gown \w is|strong="H6440"\w* embroidered \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gold.

\w In|strong="H4428"\w* colorful \w garments|strong="H3830"\w* she \w is|strong="H3605"\w* led \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w her|strong="H3605"\w* virgin companions \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* before \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w They|strong="H4428"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w led|strong="H2986"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* joy \w and|strong="H4428"\w* gladness; \w they|strong="H4428"\w* enter \w the|strong="H4428"\w* palace \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H4428"\w* sons \w will|strong="H4428"\w* succeed \w your|strong="H4428"\w* fathers; \w you|strong="H8057"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* make them princes throughout \w the|strong="H4428"\w* land.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* commemorate \w your|strong="H3605"\w* name \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations; \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w will|strong="H1961"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ever.
